TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Idas, title = Idas, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Idas} }

S.FORM: Idas (月亮; patis: ) ge paru ma mtumun na ppngerah. Mtumun ka idas de, mtbale idas kesun ta kiya. Uka idas keeman ma, kuung riyung.
Idas (月亮; patis: ) ge paro ma mtomon na ppngerah. Mtomon ka idas de, mtbale idas keson ta kiya. Uka idas keeman ma, koong riyong.
